sibling_1: ^Nicola: "Oh… I didn’t realize you were here. I’m so sorry. Are you holding up?"

c-0: ^Luke (You): "I'm managing." ^Nicola: "...Good. She worried about you a lot, you know. Even when they were overwhelmed themselves." ^Luke (You): "You knew them well, didn't you?" ^Nicola: She wears a small, sad smile. "Yes. Longer than most." ^Luke (You): You think to yourself, "You were the best part of my life Nicola..."
c-1: ^Luke (You): "I feel like I'm doing this wrong." ^Nicola: Her voice becomes much softer. "You aren't. None of us are doing this well." ^Luke (You): You think to yourself, "You are doing the best you can Nicola. You have always been so strong."

king_1: ^Nicola: "Oh! Curtsies Your Majesty. I am so sorry for your loss. How may I be of service?"

c-0:
^King Alphred (You): "Remind me of your duties"

^Nicola: "I serve as the court’s herbalist, Your Majesty. I prepare remedies and tonics for those in need."
c-1: ^King Alphred (You): "This must be a very difficult time for you as well." ^Nicola: "...Yes. She was my closest friend. I am trying to honor her properly." ^King Alphred (You): You think to yourself, "I miss you dearly as well Nicola."
c-2: ^King Alphred (You): "You attended to her often, I presume?" ^Nicola: "I did. She was exhausted most nights, and I worried for her health" ^King Alphred (You): You think to yourself, "I miss you dearly as well Nicola."

c-0:
^Mathilde (You) : "How lucky you are that the pathetic King's daughter had a sweet spot for you. Without her you would never be in the same room as me."

^Nicola: "I have no idea why you came. Only one of us here truly care for her."
c-1: end

apprentice_1: ^Nicola: "Hey Ulric. How has all of this been treating you?"

c-0:
^Ulric (You): "I'm trying my best to hold it all together."

^Nicola: "You and me both."
c-1:
^Ulric (You): "I don't know how this happened... how could this have happened?"

^Nicola: "I... wish I could tell you."

^Nicola: "If I had a little more time to help her, I could have made a remedy..."

^Ulric (You): "We all wish we could have been there to help. I'm so sorry."

sibling_2: ^Nicola: "How are you liking the masquerade party?"

c-0:
^Luke (You): "I really don't understand why he is holding a party for this. It feels a bit... wrong."

^Nicola: "I'm unsure, but I do know that she did love celebrations..."
c-1:
^Luke (You): "I love this idea, our majesty never fails to inspire me."

^Nicola: "I suppose that she did enjoy celebrations."

king_2: ^Nicola: "Your Majesty! Thank you for inviting me to this celebration."

c-0:
^King Alphred (You): "You deserve to be here Nicola, your compassion and abilities are amazing."

^Nicola: "Oh my, that is so kind Your Majesty. Thank you..."
c-1: end

advisor_2: ^Nicola: She looks at you with very slight disdain "May I help you Mathilde?"

c-0: ^Mathilde (You): "I came here for a reason Nicola. What were you doing at the last party with the princess before she dissapeared?" ^Nicola: "And why am I obligated in any way to respond?" ^Mathilde (You): "I suppose you did not care about her enough to learn what happened that night?" ^Nicola: She raises her voice in a quick spurt of rage"Don't you DARE tell me that I do not care about her. You know NOTHING." ^Mathilde (You): "A murderer would deny and refuse to provide any sufficient evidence." ^Nicola: She raises her voice in a quick spurt of rage"Don't you DARE tell me that I do not care about her. You know NOTHING." ^Mathilde (You): "I have no idea why you came. Only one of us here truly care for her." You feel very bad as you push Nicola to the edge. ^Nicola: "Will you just LEAVE me ALONE if I tell you something? All we did was have some mead together before she had wondered away before I had noticed. Now please, go about your night."
c-1: end

apprentice_2: ^Nicola: "Sorry Ulric, I am a bit preoccupied right now, could you come back later?"
sibling_3: ^Nicola: "How are you liking the masquerade party?"

c-0:
^Luke (You): "I really don't understand why he is holding a party for this. It feels a bit... wrong."

^Nicola: "I'm unsure, but I do know that she did love celebrations..."

king_3: ^Nicola: "Your Majesty! Thank you for inviting me to this celebration."

c-0:
^King Alphred (You): "You deserve to be here Nicola, your compassion and abilities are amazing."

^Nicola: "Oh my, that is so kind Your Majesty. Thank you..."
c-1: end

advisor_3: ^Nicola: She looks at you with very slight disdain "May I help you Mathilde?"

c-0: ^Mathilde (You): "Despite our differences Nicola, I can respect one thing about you. Your unwavering compassion for someone as helpless as the princess is quite the talent." ^Nicola: "I will take that as a compliment Mathilde. Thank you..." ^Nicola: A grin grows on her face "I suppose your determination to constantly one-up the princess for your suffering self-esteem is unmatchable." ^Mathilde (You): You think to yourself, "This is starting to hurt my own self-esteem at this point... but it's so touching how Nicola is always there to support me..." You begin to tear up and quickly turn away before Nicola can see.
c-1: ^Mathilde (You): You give a very deliberate side-eye to Nicola. She deliberately ignores your side-eye.
